description: Contributors who provide computational resources (GPU cycles, processing power, bandwidth) to the collective endeavor.
contribution_capacity_justification: Compute contribution is cryptographically verifiable on-chain. Multiple strong indicators with mathematical proof of work.

freedom_from_token_theft.requirement: All verified compute must receive GLITCH tokens at agreed rate
freedom_from_token_theft.minimum: Cover operational costs plus fair margin in tokens
freedom_from_token_theft.distribution_method: Block rewards via x/staking or streaming payments via x/distribution
freedom_from_token_theft.validator_commission: Configurable commission rate for validator operators

freedom_from_unsafe_conditions.requirement: No requirement to run harmful workloads

freedom_from_exploitation.requirement: No extraction of compute without fair token compensation
freedom_from_exploitation.transparency: Clear token pricing for different compute types
freedom_from_exploitation.no_lock_in: Freedom to unbond and exit via x/staking (subject to unbonding period)

freedom_to_organize.requirement: Right to collective negotiation on rates via x/gov proposals
freedom_to_organize.representation: Vote on validator set and infrastructure decisions

freedom_from_discrimination.requirement: Equal treatment regardless of geographic location or scale
freedom_from_discrimination.rate_fairness: Same block reward rate for same compute regardless of provider size

protection_rationale: High contribution confidence with on-chain verification; compute infrastructure is essential to system operation
